description:
Added Backing Vocals, these were mostly worked out through their live DVD performance of the song
Fixed Vocal timing and some errors the vocal track.
Had to move the entire track down an octave as backing vocals were impossible to play otherwise.
Added sections
Renamed certain tracks appropriately
Backing vocals were not performed by Ashley in this song so again i don't know who performed them so was unable to name the track.
title: Heart Of Fire
